customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
Just as was foretold via Alchemical Divination, you, who have been stricken by ill fate, encounter a pack of Abyss Mages during a simple foraging foray...
<color=#ccbfad>Hint: When you fight Abyss Mages of different Elemental Types simultaneously, the Swirl reaction might have unexpected results against them..</color> .
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
This student from the Akademiya has set up a new game through Alchemical Divination. But is it really connected to one's fate...? Anyways, as an an Adventure Challenge, it is worth a try.

customize.name: Stonehide Lawachurl
customize.desc:
"Vale-Crosser" Stonehide Lawachurl

Go around — the way ahead is the realm of the "king."

customize.name: Noelle
customize.desc:
"Chivalric Blossom" Noelle

You can leave arranging the table to her — really, you can.

customize.name: Xingqiu
customize.desc:
"Juvenile Galant" Xingqiu

"Is it just me, or are the protagonists in novels nowadays all students of some private school or another..."

customize.name: Maguu Kenki
customize.desc:
"Ingenious Machine" Maguu Kenki

Even today, it still patrols the place where fate was severed.

customize.name: Yoimiya
customize.desc:
"Frolicking Flames" Yoimiya

Captain and Vanguard of Team Naganohara for the 11th Hanamizaka Street Invitational.

customize.name: Fischl
customize.desc:
"Fischl, Prinzessin der Verurteilung!" Fischl

"Oz, mine familiar, spread thine wings and weave for me a new fate in the gloom of this night!"

"Mein Fräulein, you cannot expect me to fetch you a replacement card…"
